00042 #include <stdlib.h>
00043 #include <math.h>

00050 
00064 double* ssht_dl_calloc(int L, ssht_dl_size_t dl_size) {
00065   
00066   double *dl;
00067 
00068   // Allocate memory.
00069   switch (dl_size) {
00070 
00071     case SSHT_DL_QUARTER:
00072       dl = (double*)calloc(L*L, sizeof(double));
00073       break;
00074 
00075     case SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED:
00076       dl = (double*)calloc((L+1)*(L+3), sizeof(double));
00077       break;
00078 
00079     case SSHT_DL_HALF:
00080       dl = (double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
00081       break;
00082 
00083     case SSHT_DL_FULL:
00084       dl = (double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
00085       break;
00086 
00087     default:
00088       SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl size") 
00089 
00090   }
00091 
00092   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
00093   return dl;
00094 
00095 }
00096 
00097 
00111 int ssht_dl_get_offset(int L, ssht_dl_size_t dl_size) {
00112     
00113   switch (dl_size) {     
00114     case SSHT_DL_QUARTER:
00115       return 0;
00116 
00117     case SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED:
00118       return L - 1;
00119 
00120     case SSHT_DL_HALF:
00121       return L - 1;
00122 
00123     case SSHT_DL_FULL:
00124       return L - 1;
00125 
00126     default:
00127       SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl size") 
00128   }
00129 
00130 }
00131 
00132 
00146 int ssht_dl_get_stride(int L, ssht_dl_size_t dl_size) {
00147     
00148   switch (dl_size) {     
00149     case SSHT_DL_QUARTER:
00150       return L;
00151 
00152     case SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED:
00153       return L + 3;
00154 
00155     case SSHT_DL_HALF:
00156       return 2*L - 1;
00157 
00158     case SSHT_DL_FULL:
00159       return 2*L - 1;
00160 
00161     default:
00162       SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl size") 
00163   }
00164 
00165 }

00167 
00190 void ssht_dl_beta_risbo_full_table(double *dl, double beta, int L, 
00191                                       ssht_dl_size_t dl_size,
00192                                       int el, double *sqrt_tbl) {
00193 
00194   int offset, stride;
00195   double cosb, sinb, coshb, sinhb;
00196   int i, j, k;
00197   double rj, dlj, ddj;
00198   double *dd;
00199     
00200   // Get mm offset and stride for accessing dl data.
00201   offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl_size);
00202   stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl_size);
00203 
00204   // Compute Wigner plane.
00205   if (el == 0) {
00206     
00207     dl[(0+offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = 1.0;
00208 
00209   }
00210   else if (el == 1) {
00211 
00212     cosb = cos(beta);
00213     sinb = sin(beta);
00214     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
00215     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00216    
00217     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00218     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00219     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00220 
00221     dl[(0 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00222     dl[(0 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = cosb;
00223     dl[(0 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00224 
00225     dl[(1 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00226     dl[(1 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00227     dl[(1 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00228 
00229   }
00230   else {
00231 
00232     coshb = -cos(beta / 2.0);
00233     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00234 
00235     // Initialise the plane of the dl-matrix to 0.0 for the recursion
00236     // from l - 1 to l - 1/2.
00237     dd = (double*)calloc((2*el+2)*(2*el+2), sizeof(double));
00238     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dd)
00239 
00240     j = 2*el - 1;
00241     rj = (double) j;
00242     for (k=0; k<=j-1; k++) {
00243       for (i=0; i<=j-1; i++) {
00244         dlj = dl[(k-(el-1)+offset)*stride + i-(el-1) + offset] / rj;
00245         dd[k*(2*el+2) + i] +=
00246           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * dlj * coshb;
00247         dd[k*(2*el+2) + i+1] -=
00248           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * dlj * sinhb;
00249         dd[(k+1)*(2*el+2) + i] +=
00250           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * dlj * sinhb;
00251         dd[(k+1)*(2*el+2) + i+1] +=
00252           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * dlj * coshb;
00253       }
00254     }
00255 
00256     // Having constructed the d^(l+1/2) matrix in dd, do the second
00257     // half-step recursion from dd to dl. Start by initilalising  
00258     // the plane of the dl-matrix to 0.0.
00259     for (k=-el; k<=el; k++) 
00260       for (i=-el; i<=el; i++)
00261         dl[(k+offset)*stride + i + offset] = 0.0;
00262 
00263     j = 2*el;
00264     rj = (double) j;
00265     for (k=0; k<=j-1; k++) {
00266       for (i=0; i<=j-1; i++) {
00267         ddj = dd[k*(2*el+2) + i] / rj;
00268         dl[(k-el+offset)*stride + i-el + offset] +=
00269           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * ddj * coshb;
00270         dl[(k-el+offset)*stride + i+1-el + offset] -=
00271           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * ddj * sinhb;
00272         dl[(k+1-el+offset)*stride + i-el + offset] +=
00273           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * ddj * sinhb;
00274         dl[(k+1-el+offset)*stride + i+1-el + offset] +=
00275           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * ddj * coshb;
00276       }
00277     }
00278 
00279     // Free temporary memory.
00280     free(dd);
00281   }
00282 
00283 }
00284 
00285 
00313 void ssht_dl_beta_risbo_half_table(double *dl, double beta, int L, 
00314                                    ssht_dl_size_t dl_size,
00315                                    int el, double *sqrt_tbl,
00316                                    double *signs) {
00317 
00318   int offset, stride;
00319   double cosb, sinb, coshb, sinhb;
00320   int i, j, k;
00321   double rj, dlj, ddj;
00322   double *dd;
00323   int m, mm;
00324 
00325   // Get mm offset and stride for accessing dl data.
00326   offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl_size);
00327   stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl_size);
00328 
00329   // Compute Wigner plane.
00330   if (el == 0) {
00331     
00332     dl[(0+offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = 1.0;
00333 
00334   }
00335   else if (el == 1) {
00336 
00337     cosb = cos(beta);
00338     sinb = sin(beta);
00339     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
00340     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00341    
00342     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00343     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00344     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00345 
00346     dl[(0 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00347     dl[(0 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = cosb;
00348     dl[(0 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00349 
00350     dl[(1 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00351     dl[(1 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00352     dl[(1 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00353 
00354   }
00355   else {
00356 
00357     coshb = -cos(beta / 2.0);
00358     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00359 
00360     // Initialise the plane of the dl-matrix to 0.0 for the recursion
00361     // from l - 1 to l - 1/2.
00362     dd = (double*)calloc((2*el+2)*(2*el+2), sizeof(double));
00363     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dd)
00364 
00365     j = 2*el - 1;
00366     rj = (double) j;
00367     for (k=0; k<=j-1; k++) {
00368       for (i=0; i<=el; i++) {
00369         dlj = dl[(k-(el-1)+offset)*stride + i-(el-1) + offset] / rj;
00370         dd[k*(2*el+2) + i] +=
00371           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * dlj * coshb;
00372         dd[k*(2*el+2) + i+1] -=
00373           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * dlj * sinhb;
00374         dd[(k+1)*(2*el+2) + i] +=
00375           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * dlj * sinhb;
00376         dd[(k+1)*(2*el+2) + i+1] +=
00377           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * dlj * coshb;
00378       }
00379     }
00380 
00381     // Having constructed the d^(l+1/2) matrix in dd, do the second
00382     // half-step recursion from dd to dl. Start by initilalising  
00383     // the plane of the dl-matrix to 0.0.
00384     for (k=-el; k<=el; k++) 
00385       for (i=-el; i<=el; i++)
00386         dl[(k+offset)*stride + i + offset] = 0.0;
00387 
00388     j = 2*el;
00389     rj = (double) j;
00390     for (k=0; k<=j-1; k++) {
00391       for (i=0; i<=el; i++) {
00392         ddj = dd[k*(2*el+2) + i] / rj;
00393         dl[(k-el+offset)*stride + i-el + offset] +=
00394           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * ddj * coshb;
00395         dl[(k-el+offset)*stride + i+1-el + offset] -=
00396           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * ddj * sinhb;
00397         dl[(k+1-el+offset)*stride + i-el + offset] +=
00398           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * ddj * sinhb;
00399         dl[(k+1-el+offset)*stride + i+1-el + offset] +=
00400           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * ddj * coshb;
00401       }
00402     }
00403 
00404     // Fill top half of plane using symmetry.
00405     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) 
00406       for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) 
00407         dl[(m+offset)*stride + mm + offset] = 
00408           signs[el] * signs[abs(m)]
00409           * dl[(m+offset)*stride - mm + offset];
00410 
00411     // Free temporary memory.
00412     free(dd);
00413   }
00414 
00415 }

00445 void ssht_dl_beta_risbo_quarter_table(double *dl, double beta, int L, 
00446                                       ssht_dl_size_t dl_size,
00447                                       int el, double *sqrt_tbl,
00448                                       double * signs) {
00449 
00450   int offset, stride;
00451   double cosb, sinb, coshb, sinhb;
00452   int i, j, k;
00453   double rj, dlj, ddj;
00454   double *dd;
00455   int m, mm;
00456 
00457   // Get mm offset and stride for accessing dl data.
00458   offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl_size);
00459   stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl_size);
00460 
00461   // Compute Wigner plane.
00462   if (el == 0) {
00463     
00464     dl[(0+offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = 1.0;
00465 
00466   }
00467   else if (el == 1) {
00468 
00469     cosb = cos(beta);
00470     sinb = sin(beta);
00471     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
00472     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00473    
00474     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00475     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00476     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00477 
00478     dl[(0 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00479     dl[(0 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = cosb;
00480     dl[(0 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00481 
00482     dl[(1 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00483     dl[(1 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00484     dl[(1 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00485 
00486   }
00487   else {
00488 
00489     coshb = -cos(beta / 2.0);
00490     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00491 
00492     // Initialise the plane of the dl-matrix to 0.0 for the recursion
00493     // from l - 1 to l - 1/2.
00494     dd = (double*)calloc((2*el+2)*(2*el+2), sizeof(double));
00495     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dd)
00496 
00497     j = 2*el - 1;
00498     rj = (double) j;
00499     for (k=0; k<=el; k++) {
00500       for (i=0; i<=el; i++) {
00501         dlj = dl[(k-(el-1)+offset)*stride + i-(el-1) + offset] / rj;
00502         dd[k*(2*el+2) + i] +=
00503           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * dlj * coshb;
00504         dd[k*(2*el+2) + i+1] -=
00505           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * dlj * sinhb;
00506         dd[(k+1)*(2*el+2) + i] +=
00507           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * dlj * sinhb;
00508         dd[(k+1)*(2*el+2) + i+1] +=
00509           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * dlj * coshb;
00510       }
00511     }
00512 
00513     // Having constructed the d^(l+1/2) matrix in dd, do the second
00514     // half-step recursion from dd to dl. Start by initilalising  
00515     // the plane of the dl-matrix to 0.0.
00516     for (k=-el; k<=el; k++) 
00517       for (i=-el; i<=el; i++)
00518         dl[(k+offset)*stride + i + offset] = 0.0;
00519 
00520     j = 2*el;
00521     rj = (double) j;
00522     for (k=0; k<=el; k++) {
00523       for (i=0; i<=el; i++) {
00524         ddj = dd[k*(2*el+2) + i] / rj;
00525         dl[(k-el+offset)*stride + i-el + offset] +=
00526           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * ddj * coshb;
00527         dl[(k-el+offset)*stride + i+1-el + offset] -=
00528           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * ddj * sinhb;
00529         dl[(k+1-el+offset)*stride + i-el + offset] +=
00530           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * ddj * sinhb;
00531         dl[(k+1-el+offset)*stride + i+1-el + offset] +=
00532           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * ddj * coshb;
00533       }
00534     }
00535 
00536     // Symmetry in m to fill half plane.
00537     for (m=1; m<=el; m++) 
00538       for (mm=-el; mm<=0; mm++) 
00539         dl[(m+offset)*stride + mm + offset] = 
00540           pow(-1., el) * pow(-1.,mm) 
00541           * dl[(-m+offset)*stride + mm + offset];
00542 
00543     // Symmetry in mm to fill entire plane.
00544     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) 
00545       for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) 
00546         dl[(m+offset)*stride + mm + offset] = 
00547           pow(-1., el) * pow(-1.,m) 
00548           * dl[(m+offset)*stride - mm + offset];
00549 
00550     // Free temporary memory.
00551     free(dd);
00552   }
00553 
00554 }

00556 
00588 void ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(double *dl, double beta, int L, 
00589                                       ssht_dl_size_t dl_size,
00590                                       int el, double *sqrt_tbl,
00591                                       double *signs) {
00592 
00593   int offset, stride;
00594   double cosb, sinb, coshb, sinhb;
00595   int i, j, k;
00596   double rj, dlj, ddj;
00597   double *dd;
00598   int m, mm;
00599 
00600   // Get mm offset and stride for accessing dl data.
00601   offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl_size);
00602   stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl_size);
00603 
00604   // Compute Wigner plane.
00605   if (el == 0) {
00606     
00607     dl[(0+offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = 1.0;
00608 
00609   }
00610   else if (el == 1) {
00611 
00612     cosb = cos(beta);
00613     sinb = sin(beta);
00614     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
00615     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00616    
00617     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00618     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00619     dl[(-1 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00620 
00621     dl[(0 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00622     dl[(0 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = cosb;
00623     dl[(0 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00624 
00625     dl[(1 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00626     dl[(1 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00627     dl[(1 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00628 
00629   }
00630   else {
00631 
00632     coshb = -cos(beta / 2.0);
00633     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00634 
00635     // Initialise the plane of the dl-matrix to 0.0 for the recursion
00636     // from l - 1 to l - 1/2.
00637     dd = (double*)calloc((el+3)*(el+3), sizeof(double));
00638     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dd)
00639 
00640     j = 2*el - 1;
00641     rj = (double) j;
00642     for (k=0; k<=el; k++) {
00643       for (i=0; i<=k+2; i++) {
00644         dlj = dl[(k-(el-1)+offset)*stride + i-(el-1) + offset] / rj;    
00645         dd[k*(el+3) + i] +=
00646           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * dlj * coshb;
00647         dd[k*(el+3) + i+1] -=
00648           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * dlj * sinhb;
00649         dd[(k+1)*(el+3) + i] +=
00650           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * dlj * sinhb;
00651         dd[(k+1)*(el+3) + i+1] +=
00652           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * dlj * coshb;
00653       }
00654     }
00655 
00656     // Having constructed the d^(l+1/2) matrix in dd, do the second
00657     // half-step recursion from dd to dl. Start by initilalising  
00658     // the plane of the dl-matrix to 0.0.
00659     for (k=-el; k<=1; k++) 
00660       for (i=-el; i<=3; i++)
00661         dl[(k+offset)*stride + i + offset] = 0.0;
00662 
00663     j = 2*el;
00664     rj = (double) j;
00665     for (k=0; k<=el; k++) {
00666       for (i=0; i<=k+1; i++) {
00667         ddj = dd[k*(el+3) + i] / rj;
00668         dl[(k-el+offset)*stride + i-el + offset] +=
00669           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * ddj * coshb;
00670         dl[(k-el+offset)*stride + i+1-el + offset] -=
00671           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[j-k] * ddj * sinhb;
00672         dl[(k+1-el+offset)*stride + i-el + offset] +=
00673           sqrt_tbl[j-i] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * ddj * sinhb;
00674         dl[(k+1-el+offset)*stride + i+1-el + offset] +=
00675           sqrt_tbl[i+1] * sqrt_tbl[k+1] * ddj * coshb;
00676       }
00677     }
00678 
00679     // Extend dl plane about boundaries, using symmetries, to the
00680     // extents required for recursion.
00681 
00682     // Extend above diagonal by two in mm.
00683     for (m=-el; m<=0; m++)
00684       for (mm=m+1; mm<=m+2; mm++)
00685         dl[(m+offset)*stride + mm + offset] =
00686           signs[abs(m)] * signs[abs(mm)] 
00687           * dl[(mm+offset)*stride + m + offset];
00688 
00689     // Extend right by one in m.
00690     for (m=1; m<=1; m++)
00691       for (mm=-el; mm<=0; mm++)
00692         dl[(m+offset)*stride + mm + offset] =
00693           signs[abs(el)] * signs[abs(mm)] 
00694           * dl[(-m+offset)*stride + mm + offset];
00695 
00696     // Extend up by one in mm.
00697     for (m=-el; m<=1; m++)
00698       for (mm=1; mm<=1; mm++)
00699         dl[(m+offset)*stride + mm + offset] =
00700           signs[abs(el)] * signs[abs(m)]
00701           * dl[(m+offset)*stride - mm + offset];
00702 
00703     // Free temporary memory.
00704     free(dd);
00705   }
00706 
00707 }
00708 
00709 
00734 void ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(double *dl, 
00735                                                   double *dl8,
00736                                                   int L,
00737                                                   ssht_dl_size_t dl_size,
00738                                                   ssht_dl_size_t dl8_size,
00739                                                   int el, 
00740                                                   double *signs) {
00741 
00742   int offset, stride, offset8, stride8;
00743   int m, mm;
00744 
00745   // Get mm offset and stride for accessing dl data.
00746   offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl_size);
00747   stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl_size);
00748   offset8 = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl8_size);
00749   stride8 = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl8_size);
00750 
00751   // Symmetry through origin to get eighth of the required quarter
00752   // (first quadrant).
00753   for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
00754     for (mm=m; mm<=el; mm++)
00755       dl[(m+offset)*stride + mm + offset] =
00756         signs[m] * signs[mm]
00757         * dl8[(-m+offset8)*stride8 - mm + offset8];
00758 
00759   // Diagonal symmetry to fill remaining quarter.
00760   for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
00761     for (mm=0; mm<=m-1; mm++)
00762       dl[(m+offset)*stride + mm + offset] =
00763         signs[m] * signs[mm]
00764         * dl[(mm+offset)*stride + m + offset];
00765 
00766 }
00767 
00768 
00797 void ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_full_table(double *dlm1p1, double *dl, 
00798                                       double beta, int L, 
00799                                       ssht_dl_size_t dl_size,
00800                                       int el, 
00801                                       double *sqrt_tbl, double *signs) {
00802 
00803   int offset, stride;
00804   double cosb, sinb, coshb, sinhb;
00805   double lnAlm, lnfact2el;
00806   int m, mm, elm1;
00807   double elr, elm1r;
00808     
00809   // Get mm offset and stride for accessing dl data.
00810   offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl_size);
00811   stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl_size);
00812 
00813   // Compute Wigner plane.
00814   if (el == 0) {
00815     
00816     dlm1p1[(0+offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = 1.0;
00817 
00818   }
00819   else if (el == 1) {
00820 
00821     cosb = cos(beta);
00822     sinb = sin(beta);
00823     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
00824     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00825 
00826     // These terms follow directly from the boundary conditions and
00827     // one recursion to get the central term.
00828    
00829     dlm1p1[(-1 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00830     dlm1p1[(-1 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00831     dlm1p1[(-1 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00832 
00833     dlm1p1[(0 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00834     dlm1p1[(0 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = cosb;
00835     dlm1p1[(0 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00836 
00837     dlm1p1[(1 + offset)*stride - 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00838     dlm1p1[(1 + offset)*stride + 0 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00839     dlm1p1[(1 + offset)*stride + 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00840 
00841   }
00842   else {
00843 
00844     cosb = cos(beta);
00845     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
00846     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00847 
00848     elr = (double) el;
00849     elm1 = el - 1;
00850     elm1r = (double) elm1;
00851 
00852     // Recurse over all of plane except boundaries.
00853     for (m=-(el-1); m<=el-1; m++) {
00854       for (mm=-(el-1); mm<=el-1; mm++) {
00855 
00856         // Compute 3-term recursion.
00857         dlm1p1[(m + offset)*stride + mm + offset] = 
00858           (cosb - m*mm/(elm1r*elr)) * dl[(m + offset)*stride + mm + offset] 
00859           - 
00860           sqrt_tbl[elm1+m] * sqrt_tbl[elm1-m] * sqrt_tbl[elm1+mm] * sqrt_tbl[elm1-mm] 
00861           / (elm1r * (2.0*elm1r + 1.0))
00862           * dlm1p1[(m + offset)*stride + mm + offset];
00863 
00864         // Perform scaling.
00865         dlm1p1[(m + offset)*stride + mm + offset] *= 
00866           el * (2*elm1 + 1.0)
00867           / (sqrt_tbl[el-m] * sqrt_tbl[el+m] * sqrt_tbl[el-mm] * sqrt_tbl[el+mm]);
00868 
00869       }
00870     }
00871 
00872     // Compute boundaries.
00873     lnfact2el = logfact(2*el);
00874     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
00875 
00876       lnAlm = (lnfact2el - logfact(el+m) - logfact(el-m)) / 2.0;
00877 
00878       // Right line.
00879       dlm1p1[(el + offset)*stride + m + offset] =  
00880         signs[el] * signs[abs(m)]
00881         * exp(lnAlm + (el+m)*log(coshb) + (el-m)*log(sinhb));
00882 
00883       // Left line.
00884       dlm1p1[(-el + offset)*stride + m + offset] =  
00885         exp(lnAlm + (el-m)*log(coshb) + (el+m)*log(sinhb));
00886 
00887       // Top line.
00888       dlm1p1[(m + offset)*stride + el + offset] =  
00889         exp(lnAlm + (el+m)*log(coshb) + (el-m)*log(sinhb));
00890 
00891       // Bottom line.
00892       dlm1p1[(m + offset)*stride - el + offset] =  
00893         signs[el] * signs[abs(m)]
00894         * exp(lnAlm + (el-m)*log(coshb) + (el+m)*log(sinhb));
00895     }
00896 
00897   }
00898 
00899 }
00900 
00901 
00930 void ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_line_table(double *dlm1p1_line, double *dl_line, 
00931                                       double beta, int L, int mm, int el, 
00932                                       double *sqrt_tbl, double *signs) {
00933 
00934   int offset;
00935   double cosb, sinb, coshb, sinhb;
00936   double lnAlm, lnAlmm, lnfact2el;
00937   int m, elm1;
00938   double elr, elm1r;
00939   
00940   // Compute m offset for accessing dl line.
00941   offset = L-1;
00942 
00943   // Compute Wigner plane.
00944   if (el < abs(mm)) {
00945     // Do nothing (dl line should remain zero).
00946     return;
00947   }
00948   else if (el == 1) {
00949 
00950     cosb = cos(beta);
00951     sinb = sin(beta);
00952     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
00953     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00954 
00955     if (mm == -1) {
00956       dlm1p1_line[-1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00957       dlm1p1_line[ 0 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00958       dlm1p1_line[ 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00959     }
00960     else if (mm == 0) {
00961       dlm1p1_line[-1 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00962       dlm1p1_line[ 0 + offset] = cosb;
00963       dlm1p1_line[ 1 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00964     }
00965     else {
00966       // mm == +1
00967       dlm1p1_line[-1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
00968       dlm1p1_line[ 0 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
00969       dlm1p1_line[ 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
00970     }
00971 
00972   }
00973   else if (el == abs(mm)) {
00974 
00975     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
00976     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
00977 
00978     // Initalise line using equation (4.8) or (4.9) from K&R (2010).
00979     if (mm >= 0) {
00980 
00981       // Initialise using equation (4.8), i.e. top line.
00982       lnfact2el = logfact(2*el);
00983       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
00984         lnAlm = (lnfact2el - logfact(el+m) - logfact(el-m)) / 2.0;
00985         dlm1p1_line[m + offset] = 
00986           exp(lnAlm + (el+m)*log(coshb) + (el-m)*log(sinhb));
00987       }
00988 
00989     }
00990     else {
00991 
00992       // Initialise using equation (4.9), i.e. bottom line.
00993       lnfact2el = logfact(2*el);
00994       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
00995         lnAlm = (lnfact2el - logfact(el+m) - logfact(el-m)) / 2.0;
00996         dlm1p1_line[m + offset] = 
00997           signs[el] * signs[abs(m)]
00998           * exp(lnAlm + (el-m)*log(coshb) + (el+m)*log(sinhb));
00999       }
01000 
01001     }
01002 
01003   }
01004   else {
01005 
01006     cosb = cos(beta);
01007     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
01008     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
01009 
01010     elr = (double) el;
01011     elm1 = el - 1;
01012     elm1r = (double) elm1;
01013 
01014     // Recuse over line.
01015     for (m=-(el-1); m<=el-1; m++) {
01016 
01017       // Compute 3-term recursion.
01018       dlm1p1_line[m + offset] = 
01019         (cosb - m*mm/(elm1r*elr)) * dl_line[m + offset] 
01020         - 
01021         sqrt_tbl[elm1+m] * sqrt_tbl[elm1-m] * sqrt_tbl[elm1+mm] * sqrt_tbl[elm1-mm] 
01022         / (elm1r * (2.0*elm1r + 1.0))
01023         * dlm1p1_line[m + offset];
01024       
01025       // Perform scaling.
01026       dlm1p1_line[m + offset] *= 
01027         el * (2*elm1 + 1.0)
01028         / (sqrt_tbl[el-m] * sqrt_tbl[el+m] * sqrt_tbl[el-mm] * sqrt_tbl[el+mm]);
01029 
01030     }
01031 
01032     // Compute edges...
01033     lnfact2el = logfact(2*el);
01034     lnAlmm = (lnfact2el - logfact(el+mm) - logfact(el-mm)) / 2.0;
01035     
01036     // Left edge.
01037     dlm1p1_line[-el + offset] =  
01038       exp(lnAlmm + (el-mm)*log(coshb) + (el+mm)*log(sinhb));
01039 
01040     // Right edge.
01041     dlm1p1_line[el + offset] =  
01042       signs[el] * signs[abs(mm)]
01043       * exp(lnAlmm + (el+mm)*log(coshb) + (el-mm)*log(sinhb));
01044 
01045   }
01046 
01047 }
01048 
01049 
01078 void ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_halfline_table(double *dlm1p1_line, double *dl_line, 
01079                                           double beta, int L, int mm, int el, 
01080                                           double *sqrt_tbl, double *signs) {
01081 
01082   int offset;
01083   double cosb, sinb, coshb, sinhb;
01084   double lnAlm, lnAlmm, lnfact2el;
01085   int m, elm1;
01086   double elr, elm1r;
01087   
01088   // Compute m offset for accessing dl line.
01089   offset = 0;
01090 
01091   // Compute Wigner plane.
01092   if (el < abs(mm)) {
01093     // Do nothing (dl line should remain zero).
01094     return;
01095   }
01096   else if (el == 1) {
01097 
01098     cosb = cos(beta);
01099     sinb = sin(beta);
01100     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
01101     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
01102 
01103     if (mm == -1) {
01104       dlm1p1_line[ 0 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
01105       dlm1p1_line[ 1 + offset] = sinhb * sinhb;
01106     }
01107     else if (mm == 0) {
01108       dlm1p1_line[ 0 + offset] = cosb;
01109       dlm1p1_line[ 1 + offset] = -sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
01110     }
01111     else {
01112       // mm == +1
01113       dlm1p1_line[ 0 + offset] = sinb / SSHT_SQRT2;
01114       dlm1p1_line[ 1 + offset] = coshb * coshb;
01115     }
01116 
01117   }
01118   else if (el == abs(mm)) {
01119 
01120     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
01121     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
01122 
01123     // Initalise line using equation (4.8) or (4.9) from K&R (2010).
01124     if (mm >= 0) {
01125 
01126       // Initialise using equation (4.8), i.e. top line.
01127       lnfact2el = logfact(2*el);
01128       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01129         lnAlm = (lnfact2el - logfact(el+m) - logfact(el-m)) / 2.0;
01130         dlm1p1_line[m + offset] = 
01131           exp(lnAlm + (el+m)*log(coshb) + (el-m)*log(sinhb));
01132       }
01133 
01134     }
01135     else {
01136 
01137       // Initialise using equation (4.9), i.e. bottom line.
01138       lnfact2el = logfact(2*el);
01139       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01140         lnAlm = (lnfact2el - logfact(el+m) - logfact(el-m)) / 2.0;
01141         dlm1p1_line[m + offset] = 
01142           signs[el] * signs[abs(m)]
01143           * exp(lnAlm + (el-m)*log(coshb) + (el+m)*log(sinhb));
01144       }
01145 
01146     }
01147 
01148   }
01149   else {
01150 
01151     cosb = cos(beta);
01152     coshb = cos(beta / 2.0);
01153     sinhb = sin(beta / 2.0);
01154 
01155     elr = (double) el;
01156     elm1 = el - 1;
01157     elm1r = (double) elm1;
01158 
01159     // Recuse over line.
01160     for (m=0; m<=el-1; m++) {
01161 
01162       // Compute 3-term recursion.
01163       dlm1p1_line[m + offset] = 
01164         (cosb - m*mm/(elm1r*elr)) * dl_line[m + offset] 
01165         - 
01166         sqrt_tbl[elm1+m] * sqrt_tbl[elm1-m] * sqrt_tbl[elm1+mm] * sqrt_tbl[elm1-mm] 
01167         / (elm1r * (2.0*elm1r + 1.0))
01168         * dlm1p1_line[m + offset];
01169       
01170       // Perform scaling.
01171       dlm1p1_line[m + offset] *= 
01172         el * (2*elm1 + 1.0)
01173         / (sqrt_tbl[el-m] * sqrt_tbl[el+m] * sqrt_tbl[el-mm] * sqrt_tbl[el+mm]);
01174 
01175     }
01176 
01177     // Compute edges...
01178     lnfact2el = logfact(2*el);
01179     lnAlmm = (lnfact2el - logfact(el+mm) - logfact(el-mm)) / 2.0;
01180        
01181     // Right edge.
01182     dlm1p1_line[el + offset] =  
01183       signs[el] * signs[abs(mm)]
01184       * exp(lnAlmm + (el+mm)*log(coshb) + (el-mm)*log(sinhb));
01185 
01186   }
01187 
01188 }
01189 
01190 
01212 void ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(double *dl, int L, 
01213                                          ssht_dl_size_t dl_size,
01214                                          int el, double *sqrt_tbl) {
01215 
01216   int m, mm, offset, stride;
01217   double *dmm;
01218   double t1, t2, s1, s2;
01219 
01220   // Allocate temporary memory.
01221   dmm = (double*)calloc(el+1, sizeof(double));
01222   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dmm)
01223 
01224   // Get mm offset and stride for accessing dl data.
01225   offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl_size);
01226   stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl_size);
01227 
01228   // Compute Wigner plane.
01229   if (el == 0) {
01230     
01231     dl[0*stride + 0 + offset] = 1.0;
01232 
01233   }
01234   else {
01235 
01236     // Eqn (9) of T&N (2006).
01237     dmm[0] = - sqrt_tbl[2*el-1] / sqrt_tbl[2*el]
01238       * dl[(el-1)*stride + 0 + offset];
01239 
01240     // Eqn (10) of T&N (2006).
01241     for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) {
01242       dmm[mm] = sqrt_tbl[el] / SSHT_SQRT2 
01243         * sqrt_tbl[2*el-1] / sqrt_tbl[el+mm] / sqrt_tbl[el+mm-1]
01244         * dl[(el-1)*stride + (mm-1) + offset];
01245     }
01246 
01247     // Initialise dl for next el.
01248     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {     
01249       dl[el*stride + mm + offset] = dmm[mm];
01250     }
01251 
01252 /*  LOGICAL BUT *NOT* MOST EFFICIENT ALGORITHM
01253     // Eqn (11) of T&N (2006).
01254     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
01255 
01256       // m = el-1 case (t2 = 0).
01257       m = el-1;
01258       dl[m*stride + mm + offset] = 2e0 * mm / sqrt_tbl[el-m] / sqrt_tbl[el+m+1]
01259         * dl[(m+1)*stride + mm + offset];
01260 
01261       // Remaining m cases.
01262       for (m=el-2; m>=mm; m--) {
01263         t1 = 2e0 * mm / sqrt_tbl[el-m] / sqrt_tbl[el+m+1]
01264           * dl[(m+1)*stride + mm + offset];
01265         t2 = sqrt_tbl[el-m-1] * sqrt_tbl[el+m+2] / sqrt_tbl[el-m] / sqrt_tbl[el+m+1]
01266           * dl[(m+2)*stride + mm + offset];
01267         dl[m*stride + mm + offset] = t1 - t2;
01268       }
01269 
01270     }
01271 */
01272 
01273     // Eqn (11) of T&N (2006).
01274     // OPTIMISED FOR MEMORY ACCESS.
01275     m = el-1;
01276     s1 = sqrt_tbl[el-m] * sqrt_tbl[el+m+1];
01277     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
01278       // m = el-1 case (t2 = 0).
01279       dl[m*stride + mm + offset] = 2e0 * mm / s1
01280         * dl[(m+1)*stride + mm + offset];
01281     }
01282 
01283     for (m=el-2; m>=0; m--) {
01284       s1 = sqrt_tbl[el-m] * sqrt_tbl[el+m+1];
01285       s2 = sqrt_tbl[el-m-1] * sqrt_tbl[el+m+2] / sqrt_tbl[el-m] / sqrt_tbl[el+m+1];
01286       for (mm=0; mm<=m; mm++) {           
01287         t1 = 2e0 * mm / s1
01288           * dl[(m+1)*stride + mm + offset];
01289         t2 = s2
01290           * dl[(m+2)*stride + mm + offset];
01291         dl[m*stride + mm + offset] = t1 - t2;
01292       }
01293 
01294     }
01295 
01296   }
01297 
01298   // Free memory.
01299   free(dmm);
01300 
01301 }
01302 
01303 
01330 void ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_quarter_table(double *dl, int L, 
01331                                          ssht_dl_size_t dl_size,
01332                                          int el, double *sqrt_tbl) {
01333 
01334   int m, mm, offset, stride;
01335   double *dmm;
01336   double t1, t2, s1, s2;
01337 
01338   // Allocate temporary memory.
01339   dmm = (double*)calloc(el+1, sizeof(double));
01340   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dmm)
01341 
01342   // Get mm offset and stride for accessing dl data.
01343   offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl_size);
01344   stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl_size);
01345 
01346   // Compute Wigner plane.
01347   if (el == 0) {
01348     
01349     dl[0*stride + 0 + offset] = 1.0;
01350 
01351   }
01352   else {
01353 
01354     // Eqn (9) of T&N (2006).
01355     dmm[0] = - sqrt_tbl[2*el-1] / sqrt_tbl[2*el]
01356       * dl[(el-1)*stride + 0 + offset];
01357 
01358     // Eqn (10) of T&N (2006).
01359     for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) {
01360       dmm[mm] = sqrt_tbl[el] / SSHT_SQRT2 
01361         * sqrt_tbl[2*el-1] / sqrt_tbl[el+mm] / sqrt_tbl[el+mm-1]
01362         * dl[(el-1)*stride + (mm-1) + offset];
01363     }
01364 
01365     // Initialise dl for next el.
01366     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {     
01367       dl[el*stride + mm + offset] = dmm[mm];
01368     }
01369 
01370 /*  LOGICAL BUT *NOT* MOST EFFICIENT ALGORITHM
01371     // Eqn (11) of T&N (2006).
01372     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
01373 
01374       // m = el-1 case (t2 = 0).
01375       m = el-1;
01376       dl[m*stride + mm + offset] = 2e0 * mm / sqrt_tbl[el-m] / sqrt_tbl[el+m+1]
01377         * dl[(m+1)*stride + mm + offset];
01378 
01379       // Remaining m cases.
01380       for (m=el-2; m>=mm; m--) {
01381         t1 = 2e0 * mm / sqrt_tbl[el-m] / sqrt_tbl[el+m+1]
01382           * dl[(m+1)*stride + mm + offset];
01383         t2 = sqrt_tbl[el-m-1] * sqrt_tbl[el+m+2] / sqrt_tbl[el-m] / sqrt_tbl[el+m+1]
01384           * dl[(m+2)*stride + mm + offset];
01385         dl[m*stride + mm + offset] = t1 - t2;
01386       }
01387 
01388     }
01389 */
01390 
01391     // Eqn (11) of T&N (2006).
01392     // OPTIMISED FOR MEMORY ACCESS.
01393     m = el-1;
01394     s1 = sqrt_tbl[el-m] * sqrt_tbl[el+m+1];
01395     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
01396       // m = el-1 case (t2 = 0).
01397       dl[m*stride + mm + offset] = 2e0 * mm / s1
01398         * dl[(m+1)*stride + mm + offset];
01399     }
01400 
01401     for (m=el-2; m>=0; m--) {
01402       s1 = sqrt_tbl[el-m] * sqrt_tbl[el+m+1];
01403       s2 = sqrt_tbl[el-m-1] * sqrt_tbl[el+m+2] / sqrt_tbl[el-m] / sqrt_tbl[el+m+1];
01404       for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
01405         t1 = 2e0 * mm / s1
01406           * dl[(m+1)*stride + mm + offset];
01407         t2 = s2
01408           * dl[(m+2)*stride + mm + offset];
01409         dl[m*stride + mm + offset] = t1 - t2;
01410       }
01411 
01412     }
01413 
01414   }
01415 
01416   // Free memory.
01417   free(dmm);
01418 
01419 }
01420 
01421 
01442 void ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2righthalf_table(double *dl, int L,
01443                                                         ssht_dl_size_t dl_size,
01444                                                         int el, double *signs) {
01445 
01446   int m, mm, offset, stride;
01447 
01448   // Get mm offset and stride for accessing dl data.
01449   offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl_size);
01450   stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl_size);
01451 
01452   // Diagonal symmetry to fill in quarter.
01453   for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
01454     for (mm=m+1; mm<=el; mm++)
01455       dl[m*stride + mm + offset] =
01456         signs[m] * signs[mm] * dl[mm*stride + m + offset];
01457 
01458   // Symmetry in mm to fill in half.
01459   for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
01460     for (mm=-el; mm<=-1; mm++)
01461       dl[m*stride + mm + offset] = 
01462         signs[el] * signs[m] * dl[m*stride - mm + offset];
01463 
01464 }
01465 
01466 
01487 void ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(double *dl, int L,
01488                                                      ssht_dl_size_t dl_size,
01489                                                      int el, double *signs) {
01490 
01491   int m, mm, offset, stride;
01492 
01493   // Get mm offset and stride for accessing dl data.
01494   offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, dl_size);
01495   stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, dl_size);
01496 
01497   // Diagonal symmetry to fill in quarter.
01498   for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
01499     for (mm=m+1; mm<=el; mm++)
01500       dl[m*stride + mm + offset] = 
01501         signs[m] * signs[mm] * dl[mm*stride + m + offset];
01502 
01503 }
01504 
01505 
01514 double logfact(int n) {
01515   
01516   double y, temp, sum, c[6], loggamma, x;
01517   int nn;
01518 
01519   if (n < 0) {
01520 
01521     SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Factorial argument negative") 
01522 
01523   }
01524   else {
01525 
01526     // The engine of this function actually calculates the gamma function,
01527     // for which the real argument is x = n + 1.
01528 
01529     x = (double) (n)  + 1.0;
01530 
01531     // Table of fitting constants.
01532 
01533     c[0] = 76.18009172947146;
01534     c[1] = - 86.50532032941677;
01535     c[2] = 24.01409824083091;
01536     c[3] = - 1.231739572450155;
01537     c[4] = 0.1208650973866179e-2;
01538     c[5] = - 0.5395239384953e-5;
01539 
01540     // Add up fit.
01541 
01542     temp = x + 5.5 - (x + 0.5) * log(x + 5.5);
01543     sum = 1.000000000190015;
01544     y = x;
01545 
01546     for (nn=0; nn<=5; nn++) {
01547       y = y + 1.0;
01548       sum = sum + c[nn] / y;
01549     }
01550 
01551     loggamma = - temp + log(2.5066282746310005 * sum / x);
01552 
01553   }
01554 
01555   // Finally make explicit the conversion back to log of the factorial.
01556   return loggamma;
01557 
01558 }
